General.Name: Wealth Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Wealth Minerals Ltd., a junior mineral resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties primarily in Mexico. It explores for precious metals, including gold deposits. The company?s flagship property is the Yanamina Gold project, which is located in the Department of Ancash in north-central Peru. Wealth Minerals Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1177 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2K3
